definitions.definition: A brick or stone that has its longest dimension perpendicular to the face of a wall , especially one that extends through the wall's entire thickness.
A vertical joint (usually mortar ) between bricks or blocks in a horizontal course .

main_definition: A brick or stone that has its longest dimension perpendicular to the face of a wall , especially one that extends through the wall's entire thickness.
secondary_definitions: A vertical joint (usually mortar ) between bricks or blocks in a horizontal course .
